\subsubsection{Skeleton and Boundary Integrals}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在本章中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们到目前为止所看的例子问题只涉及到网格元素上的积分\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然而\end{CJK}，\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的设计在其可分离性假设\end{CJK}11.2\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中也预见到了对元素边界的积分\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在那里\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}人们认为\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}可以写成三个和\end{CJK}
$$
\begin{array}{r}
r_{h}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right)=\sum_{T \in \mathcal{T}} r_{h, T}^{\mathrm{vol}}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right)+\sum_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}} \in \mathcal{F}} r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}^{\mathrm{skel}}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right)+\sum_{\gamma^{\mathrm{b}} \in \mathcal{B}} r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\mathrm{bnd}}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right), \\
u_{h} \in U_{h}, \quad v_{h} \in V_{h}
\end{array}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}$r_{h, T}^{\text {vol }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}涉及元素上的积分项\end{CJK}$T, r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}^{\text {skel }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}涉及两个相邻元素之间的交线\end{CJK}$\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的积分\end{CJK}，$r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\text {bnd }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代表域边界项\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}例如\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于像\end{CJK}\texttt{Discontinuous Galerkin}（DG）\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}\footnotemark[154]\footnotemark[37]\footnotemark[136]\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这样的不符合要求的离散法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}需要骨架项\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}诺伊曼和\end{CJK}\texttt{Robin}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件需要对域边界进行积分\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}虽然前几节只讨论并使用了体积项\end{CJK}$r_{h, T}^{\mathrm{vol}}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但现在是讨论其他项的时候了\end{CJK}。\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类定义了局部\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}项集合器的接口\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它有骨架和边界贡献\end{CJK}$r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}^{\text {skel }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\text {bnd }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的成员方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以及它们的\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian}s。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们首先讨论与域边界项有关的方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因为它们的接口比与骨架积分有关的方法要简单一些\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第一个方法是\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它计算网格边界元素面对\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的贡献\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它的接口是\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
template <class IntersectionGeometry, class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Residual>
void alpha_boundary(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                    const Vector &xIn,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                    Residual &residualIn) const

\end{verbatim}
\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}将为每个边界交线调用该方法一次\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法必须将\end{CJK}$\mathcal{R}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\text {bnd }}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}即\end{CJK}$r_{h, \gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\text {bnd }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的代数等价物添加到作为最后一个参数给出的本地\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矢量\end{CJK}residualIn。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法看起来与第\end{CJK}11.2.3\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章中讨论的\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法非常相似\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它有五个参数\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所有这些参数的自由类型都是由相应的成员模板参数决定的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}不同的是\end{CJK}，\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法接收了一个边界交线\end{CJK}$\gamma^{\mathrm{b}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}作为它的第一个参数\end{CJK}\texttt{intersectionGeometry}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它代表了积分项的域\end{CJK}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}关于交线的细节\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}见第\end{CJK}$5.4$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章\end{CJK}）。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法的\end{CJK}entityGeometry\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}参数一样\end{CJK}，\texttt{intersectionGeometry}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象只是\end{CJK}\texttt{Intersection}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}接口意义上的封装器\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实际的交线可以通过调用方法来检索\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
const Intersection& intersection() const
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的\end{CJK}\texttt{intersectionGeometry}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}参数\end{CJK}\texttt{localFunctionSpaceUIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{localFunctionSpaceVIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是将用于试验和测试空间的\end{CJK}\texttt{local finite elements}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它们被定义在与当前边界相交的元素\end{CJK}$T_{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上\end{CJK}（\texttt{dune-grid}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}称之为\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素\end{CJK}）。\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现必须计算\end{CJK}\texttt{shape functions}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对实际边界本身的限制\end{CJK}。  \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在\end{CJK}\texttt{LocalFiniteElement}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}模块意义上的\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-localfunctions}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象可以通过调用有限元素方法从这些对象中检索出来\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这在前面的例子中已经可以看到\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}容器\end{CJK} \texttt{xIn} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}存储了当前配置在元素\end{CJK} $T_{\text {in }}$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的局部系数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}访问单个条目需要试用函数空间\end{CJK} \texttt{localFunctionSpaceUIn} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}连同索引\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}就像在\end{CJK} \texttt{alpha\_volume} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法中一样\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}同样地\end{CJK}，residualIn\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是方法写出结果残差的地方\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它们的类型与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法中的自定义类型相同\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}特别是\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这意味着必须使用其方法\end{CJK} accumulate \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}将数值添加到\end{CJK} residualIn \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了获得\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的边界项与\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的系数的关系\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}有以下方法\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
template <class IntersectionGeometry,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Jacobian>
void jacobian_boundary(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                       const Vector &xIn,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                       Jacobian &jacobianIn) const
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它计算出的矩阵\end{CJK}
$$
\nabla \mathcal{R}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\mathrm{bnd}}\left(u_{h}\right) \in \mathbb{R}^{n_{1} \times n_{2}}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}$n_{1}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是元素上试验函数空间的自由度数\end{CJK}，$n_{2}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是元素上试验函数的数量\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矩阵的条目\end{CJK}$(i, j)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}将包含数字\end{CJK}
$$
\frac{\partial\left(\mathcal{R}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{b}}}^{\text {bnd }}\right)_{i}}{\partial u_{j}}
$$
\texttt{jacobian\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的参数与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法的参数相同\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}唯一不同的是第五个参数\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它接收结果\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}虽然\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法在这里有一个矢量数据类型\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法期望的是一个矩阵\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该矩阵类型的语法要求与第\end{CJK}11.2.3\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章中讨论的\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法相同\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}下一节给出了该方法的一个实现示例\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}至于体积方法\end{CJK}，\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类并不能自动识别\end{CJK}\texttt{Local0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现中的\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如果\end{CJK}\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现有一个方法\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它必须设置\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
constexpr static bool doAlphaBoundary = true;
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}作为\end{CJK}\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现类的一个静态成员常量\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}否则\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法将不会被\end{CJK}\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象调用\end{CJK}。

\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}接口的第二个方法允许计算网格骨架的交线\end{CJK}$\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如果网格是符合要求的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}那么骨架自然会被分解成元素面\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但不符合要求的网格也可以被处理\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}骨架上的残余项是通过以下方法组装的\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
template <class IntersectionGeometry,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Residual>
void `alpha_skeleton`(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                    const Vector &xIn,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUOut,
                    const Vector &xOut,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                    Residual &residualIn, Residual &residualOut) const
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如果\end{CJK}\texttt{doAlphaSkeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}被\end{CJK}\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的实现所设置\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它就会被\end{CJK}\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}调用\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于不属于域边界的每个交线\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}当理解了\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个标签很容易理解\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}当前的交线再次以交线几何对象\end{CJK}\texttt{intersectionGeometry}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的形式交给该方法\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}有形状函数集\end{CJK}、\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}当前配置和结果残差的参数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然而\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与只涉及一个元素的\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法不同\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}骨架中的交线是由两个网格元素共享\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因此\end{CJK}，\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对每个对象有两个参数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它们通过后缀\end{CJK}\texttt{In}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素\end{CJK}）\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{Out}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素\end{CJK}）\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}进行区分\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}例如\end{CJK}，\texttt{localFunctionSpaceUIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}包含相交的\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的安萨特局部有限元空间\end{CJK}，\texttt{xOut}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}包含\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的局部配置\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了计算骨架\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}项的导数\end{CJK}，\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}有\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
template <class IntersectionGeometry,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Jacobian>
void `jacobian_skeleton`(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                       const Vector &xIn,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUOut,
                       const Vector &xOut,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                       Jacobian &jacobianInIn, Jacobian &jacobianInOut,
                       Jacobian &jacobianOutIn, Jacobian &jacobianOutOut)
    const

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它的七个输入参数与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法相同\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然而\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它有四个输出矩阵参数\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而不是\end{CJK} \texttt{alpha\_skeleton} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的两个矢量参数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这四个矩阵是\end{CJK}$2 \times 2$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}块状矩阵的块\end{CJK}。
$$
\left(\begin{array}{cc}
\text { jacobianInIn } & \text { jacobianInOut } \\
\text { jacobianOutIn } & \text { jacobian0ut0ut }
\end{array}\right)=\left(\begin{array}{cc}
\left.\frac{\partial}{\partial u_{\mathrm{in}}} r^{\mathrm{skel}}\right|_{\mathrm{in}} & \left.\frac{\partial}{\partial u_{\mathrm{out}}} r^{\mathrm{skel}}\right|_{\mathrm{in}} \\
\left.\frac{\partial}{\partial u_{\mathrm{in}}} r^{\mathrm{skel}}\right|_{\text {out }} & \left.\frac{\partial}{\partial u_{\mathrm{out}}} r^{\mathrm{skel}}\right|_{\text {out }}
\end{array}\right) .
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}例如\end{CJK}，\texttt{jacobianInOut}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}包含\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素上的代数\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}条目相对于\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素上的局部配置系数的导数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}像往常一样\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}本地\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和配置向量包含元素上所有自由度的条目\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而不仅仅是与共同交线相关的条目\end{CJK}。

\subsubsection{Example: Discontinuous Galerkin Methods}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们以一个结合了体积\end{CJK}、\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}骨架和边界项的完整例子来结束关于局部算子的章节\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为此\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们重新审视第\end{CJK}11.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章的线性反应\end{CJK}-\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}扩散的例子\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}那里的边界值问题的强形式是\end{CJK}
$$
-\Delta u+c u=f \quad \text { in } \Omega=[0,1]^{2}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与恒定的反应强度\end{CJK}$c \equiv 10$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}源函数\end{CJK}
$$
f= \begin{cases}-10 & \text { on a circle of radius } 1 / 4 \text { around the center of } \Omega \\ 10 & \text { elsewhere }\end{cases}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而且它是以零\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件提出的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们保留方程和领域\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但现在我们将\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的边界条件修改为\end{CJK}
$$
\langle\nabla u, \mathbf{n}\rangle=\mathbf{j}:= \begin{cases}-2 & \text { if } x_{1}=1 \text { and } x_{2} \in\left[\frac{1}{2}, 1\right] \\ 0 & \text { otherwise }\end{cases}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}问题的设置在\end{CJK} \href{https://cdn.mathpix.com/snip/images/ETqgJnpl3OJZirAv1vAUmTBWc5AVyrn-fVov7u8EaS0.original.fullsize.png}{Fig11.4} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中得到了说明\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界值问题的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}表述为\end{CJK}
$$
\text { Find } u \in H^{1}(\Omega): r(u, v)=0 \quad \text { for all } v \in H^{1}(\Omega)
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的形式\end{CJK}
$$
r(u, v):=\int_{\Omega}[\langle\nabla u, \nabla v\rangle+c u v-f v] d x-\int_{\partial \Omega} \mathrm{j} v d x
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与之前的例子不同\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这种形式除了包含体积积分外\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}还包含域边界的积分\end{CJK}$\partial \Omega$。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们将使用\end{CJK}\texttt{Symmetric Interior Penalty Galerkin} $($ SIPG $)$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法来离散问题\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这是一种特殊的\end{CJK}\texttt{Discontinuous Galerkin} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK} \footnotemark[154] \footnotemark[155] 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在文献中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这种方法也被简单地称为\end{CJK}\texttt{Interior Penalty}（IP）。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}设\end{CJK}$\mathcal{T}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是\end{CJK}$\Omega$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的一个网格\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}并定义不符合要求的有限元空间\end{CJK}
$$
\mathrm{DG}^{k}:=\left\{u \in L_{2}(\Omega):\left.u\right|_{T} \in \Pi_{k} \forall T \in \mathcal{T}\right\}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个空间的函数在元素边界不一定是连续的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们把它们解释为在那里是多值的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}让\end{CJK}$\gamma$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}成为一个交线\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}即\end{CJK}

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}两个相邻的元素\end{CJK} $T_{\mathrm{in}}$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK} $T_{\mathrm{out}}$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于一个函数\end{CJK}$u_{h} \in \mathrm{DG}^{k}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们定义\end{CJK}$u_{h}^{\mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是对\end{CJK}$T_{\mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的限制\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而\end{CJK}$u_{h}^{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是对\end{CJK}$T_{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的限制\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}跨越\end{CJK}$\gamma$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的跳跃是\end{CJK}
$$
\llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket_{\gamma}(x):=u_{h}^{\mathrm{in}}(x)-u_{h}^{\mathrm{out}}(x) \quad \forall x \in \gamma
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}同样地\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们将平均数定义为\end{CJK}
$$
\left\{u_{h}\right\}_{\gamma}(x):=\frac{1}{2}\left(u_{h}^{\mathrm{in}}(x)+u_{h}^{\mathrm{out}}(x)\right) \quad \forall x \in \gamma
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}请注意\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}跳跃\end{CJK}$\llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket_{\gamma}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的符号取决于\end{CJK}$\gamma$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的方向\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但平均值的符号不取决于此\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}有了这些定义\end{CJK}，SIPG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法的离散问题为\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\text { Find } u_{h} \in \mathrm{DG}^{k}: \quad r_{h}^{\mathrm{SIPG}}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right)=0 \quad \forall v_{h} \in \mathrm{DG}^{k}
\label{11.15}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
r_{h}^{\mathrm{SIPG}}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right):=& \int_{\Omega} \nabla u_{h} \nabla v_{h} d x+\int_{\Omega} c u_{h} v_{h} d x \\
&-\int_{\mathcal{F}}\left\{\left\langle\nabla u_{h}, \mathbf{n}\right\rangle\right\} \llbracket v_{h} \rrbracket d s-\int_{\mathcal{F}}\left\{\left\langle\nabla v_{h}, \mathbf{n}\right\rangle\right\} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket d s \\
&+\kappa \sum_{\gamma \in \mathcal{F}} \frac{1}{h_{\gamma}} \int_{\gamma} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket \llbracket v_{h} \rrbracket d s \\
&-\int_{\Omega} f v_{h} d x-\int_{\partial \Omega} \mathrm{j} v_{h} d s
\end{aligned}
\label{11.16}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\mathcal{F}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是所有骨架交线的联合\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}请注意分离成体积项\end{CJK}、\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}骨架项和边界项\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的体积项与第\end{CJK}11.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章的符合离散化中的体积项相同\end{CJK}。$r_{h}^{\mathrm{SIPG}}(\cdot, \cdot)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}定义中第二行的项惩罚了元素间边界的跳动\end{CJK}$\llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket$。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第三行条款确保\end{CJK}$r_{h}^{\mathrm{SIPG}}(\cdot, \cdot)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的二次方部分保持椭圆\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于惩罚参数\end{CJK}$\kappa$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}足够大\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}最后一行包含\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}形式无关的部分\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在\end{CJK}$f$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的体积积分是源项\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而在域边界\end{CJK}$\partial \Omega$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的积分是\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件\end{CJK}$\langle\nabla u, \mathbf{n}\rangle=\mathrm{j}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的弱形式\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}只要惩罚参数\end{CJK}$\kappa$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}足够大\end{CJK}，\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方程\end{CJK}\ref{11.15}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}就有一个唯一的解\end{CJK}\footnotemark[154] \footnotemark[37] 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}随着网格的细化\end{CJK}\footnotemark[154] \footnotemark[37]，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个解以最优的顺序收敛到精确的解\end{CJK}。

\textbf{The \texttt{main} Method}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}像往常一样\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}示例程序被包含在一个文件中\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它被打印在附录\end{CJK}B.13\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}可以通过边缘的图标获得\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该文件包含\end{CJK}\texttt{main}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法设置问题并调用代数求解器\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以及计算\end{CJK}SIPG \texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}形式\end{CJK}（11.16）\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的局部算子的实现\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以及其\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian} 。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们依次讨论这两部分\end{CJK}。\texttt{main}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法与第\end{CJK}11.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章中带有\end{CJK}\texttt{Lagrange}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的反应\end{CJK}-\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}扩散系统的方法非常相似\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它首先是初始化\end{CJK}MPI，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后设置网格\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    // Initialize MPI, if present
    MPIHelper::instance(argc, argv);

    constexpr int dim = 2;
    using Grid = UGGrid<dim>;
    std::shared_ptr<Grid> grid = StructuredGridFactory<Grid>::createCubeGrid({0.0, 0.0},
                                                                             {1.0, 1.0},
                                                                             {4, 4});

    // Nonconforming refinement near the domain center
    grid->setClosureType(Grid::NONE); // UGGrid-specific:
    // turn off green closure

    using Position = FieldVector<Grid::ctype, dim>;
    for (const auto &element : elements(grid->leafGridView()))
        if ((element.geometry().center() - Position(0.5)).two_norm() < 0.25)
            grid->mark(1, element);

    grid->preAdapt();
    grid->adapt();
    grid->postAdapt();

    using GridView = Grid::LeafGridView;
    const GridView gridView = grid->leafGridView();
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与第\end{CJK}11.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章不同的是\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该代码没有使用\end{CJK}\texttt{YaspGrid}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的网格实现\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}相反\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了展示\end{CJK}DG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法如何自然地处理不符合要求的网格\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码使用了\end{CJK}\texttt{UGGrid}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的实现\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}并进行了一些自适应的红色细化\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如\end{CJK}\href{https://cdn.mathpix.com/snip/images/ETqgJnpl3OJZirAv1vAUmTBWc5AVyrn-fVov7u8EaS0.original.fullsize.png}{Fig11.4} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所示\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对\end{CJK}\texttt{preAdapt}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{postAdapt}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的调用是\end{CJK}Dune \texttt{grid}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}接口规定的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}尽管这里没有传输数据\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}下一步是设置网格函数空间\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码使用\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-functions}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}模块中的函数空间基础\end{CJK}\texttt{LagrangeDGBasis}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它实现了空间\end{CJK}\texttt{Lagrange}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的标准不连续基础\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}编译时顺序为\end{CJK}$k$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该代码将这个顺序设置为\end{CJK} $k=2$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}基对象被用来建立一个\end{CJK}\texttt{GridFunctionSpace}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它是现在众所周知的\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}有限元空间的抽象概念\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Make dune-functions basis
using DGBasis = Functions::LagrangeDGBasis<GridView, 2>;
auto dgBasis = std::make_shared<DGBasis>(gridView);

// Make dune-pdelab grid function space
using VectorBackend = PDELab::ISTL::VectorBackend<>;
using GridFunctionSpace = PDELab::Experimental::GridFunctionSpace<DGBasis,
                                                                  VectorBackend,
                                                                  PDELab::NoConstraints>;

GridFunctionSpace gridFunctionSpace(dgBasis);

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码设置了汇编器\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}首先\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}定义了三个参数函数\end{CJK} $c, f$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK} $\mathrm{j}$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了简单起见\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码把这三个函数都实现为小的\end{CJK}lambda\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后交给\end{CJK}\texttt{Local0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Reaction strength
auto c = [](const FieldVector<double, dim> &x)
{
    return 10.0;
};

// Source term
auto f = [](const FieldVector<double, dim> &x)
{
    const auto center = FieldVector<double, dim>(0.5);
    auto distanceToCenter = (x - center).two_norm();
    return (distanceToCenter <= 0.25) ? -10.0 : 10.0;
};

// Neumann boundary data
auto neumann = [](const FieldVector<double, dim> &x)
{
    return (x[0] >= 0.999 && x[1] >= 0.5) ? -2 : 0;
};

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实际的汇编程序被设置\end{CJK}。\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的实现被称为\end{CJK}\texttt{ReactionDiffusionDG}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它在例子文件的前面被定义\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它被赋予三个参数函数\end{CJK}c、f、neumann\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}coercivity\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}参数\end{CJK} \texttt{kappa} 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与函数空间基数和矩阵后端一起\end{CJK}，\texttt{ReactionDiffusionDG}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}局部运算器然后被用来设置\end{CJK}\texttt{GridOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Make local operator
using LocalOperator = ReactionDiffusionDG<GridView>;
double kappa = 3;
LocalOperator localOperator(c, f, neumann, kappa);
using MatrixBackend = PDELab::ISTL::BCRSMatrixBackend<>;
MatrixBackend matrixBackend(45); // 45: Expected approximate number
// of nonzeros per matrix row

using GridOperator = PDELab::GridOperator<GridFunctionSpace, // Trial function space
                                          GridFunctionSpace, // Test function space
                                          LocalOperator,     // Element assembler
                                          MatrixBackend,     // Data structure
                                          // for the stiffness matrix
                                          double, // Number type for
                                          // solution vector entries
                                          double, // Number type for
                                          // residual vector entries
                                          double>; // Number type for
// stiffness matrix entries

GridOperator gridOperator(gridFunctionSpace,
                          gridFunctionSpace,
                          localOperator,
                          matrixBackend);
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}通过实验选择了\end{CJK}$\kappa=3$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个值\end{CJK}。\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类的设置与以前的例子一样\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在这一点上\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}汇编程序已经准备好了\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代数求解器可以被构建和运行\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Make a vector of degrees of freedom, and initialize it with 0
using VectorContainer = typename GridOperator::Traits::Domain;
VectorContainer u(gridFunctionSpace, 0.0);

// Make linear solver and solve problem
using LinearSolverBackend = PDELab::ISTLBackend_SEQ_CG_ILU0;
LinearSolverBackend linearSolverBackend(50, // Maximum number
                                        // of iterations
                                        2); // Solver verbosity

using LinearProblemSolver = PDELab::StationaryLinearProblemSolver<GridOperator,
                                                                  LinearSolverBackend,
                                                                  VectorContainer>;

LinearProblemSolver linearProblemSolver(gridOperator,
                                        linearSolverBackend,
                                        u,
                                        1e-10); // Desired relative
// residual reduction
linearProblemSolver.apply();

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}作为最后一步\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}结果被写入一个\end{CJK}VTK\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}文件\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这里与先前的例子没有区别\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Make a discrete function from the FE basis and the coefficient vector
auto uFunction = Functions::makeDiscreteGlobalBasisFunction<double>(
    *dgBasis,
    PDELab::Backend::native(u));

// We need to subsample, because VTKWriter
// cannot natively display second-order functions.
SubsamplingVTKWriter<GridView> vtkWriter(gridView,
                                         refinementLevels(5));
vtkWriter.addVertexData(uFunction,
                        VTK::FieldInfo("u",
                                       VTK::FieldInfo::Type::scalar,
                                       1));
vtkWriter.write("pdelab-dg-diffusion-result");

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}请记住\end{CJK}，\texttt{SubsamplingVTKWriter}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}总是使用\end{CJK}\texttt{VTK::nonconforming}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}数据模式\end{CJK}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第\end{CJK}$5.8.1$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$10.7)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章\end{CJK}），\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因此它自动捕捉了\end{CJK}DG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}函数的跳转\end{CJK}。

\textbf{The Local Operator}
\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的实现\end{CJK}\texttt{ReactionDiffusionDG}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}构成了这个例子的中心部分\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它将离散的\end{CJK}SIPG\texttt{residual}\ref{11.15}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}及其\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矩阵组装起来\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于这种\end{CJK}DG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}离散化比纯粹的\end{CJK}\texttt{Lagrange}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}离散化涉及更多\end{CJK}，\texttt{Local0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的实现也更加复杂\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}总的来说\end{CJK}，\texttt{ReactionDiffusionDG}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类实现了六个方法\end{CJK}。  \texttt{alpha\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于扩散\end{CJK}、\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}反应和源项\end{CJK}，\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于\end{CJK}DG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}离散化的附加项\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而\end{CJK}alpha\_boundary\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}一旦研究了第\end{CJK}$11.2 .4$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章的\end{CJK}\texttt{p-Laplace}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}例子\end{CJK}，\texttt{volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法就很容易理解\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因此这里省略了它们的介绍\end{CJK}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但在附录\end{CJK}B.13\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中显示了它们\end{CJK}）。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}只有后四种方法将被讨论\end{CJK}。

\texttt{ReactionDiffusionDG}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类有如下标签\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
template <class GridView>
class ReactionDiffusionDG
    : public PDELab::LocalOperatorDefaultFlags,
      public Dune::PDELab::FullVolumePattern,
      public Dune::PDELab::FullSkeletonPattern,
      public Dune::PDELab::FullBoundaryPattern
{

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}基类注入代码\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为三个贡献的矩阵稀疏性模式进行设置\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该类包含一个简短的辅助方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}计算一个几何体的直径\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
template <class Geometry>
static auto diameter(const Geometry &geometry)
{
    typename Geometry::ctype h = 0.0;
    for (int i = 0; i < geometry.corners(); i++)
        for (int j = i + 1; j < geometry.corners(); j++)
            h = std::max(h, (geometry.corner(j) - geometry.corner(i)).two_norm());

    return h;
}

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}下面用它来计算网格交线的直径\end{CJK}$h_{\gamma}$。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后该类声明了四个数据成员变量\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}除了矫顽力参数\end{CJK}$\kappa$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}还有三个参数函数\end{CJK}$c, f$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\mathrm{j}$。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它们被存储在类型为\end{CJK}\texttt{std::function}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的对象中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以限制该类的模板参数的数量\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
double kappa_;

static constexpr int dim = GridView::dimension;

std::function<double(const FieldVector<double, dim> &)> c_;
std::function<double(const FieldVector<double, dim> &)> f_;
std::function<double(const FieldVector<double, dim> &)> neumann_;

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}之后\end{CJK}，\texttt{Local0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现声明了它所实现的\end{CJK}\texttt{interface}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法集\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}通过将标志\end{CJK}\texttt{doAlphaVolume}、\texttt{doAlphaSkeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{doAlphaBoundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}设置为\end{CJK}\texttt{true}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该类声明它将为\end{CJK}\texttt{volume}、\texttt{skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}术语实现\end{CJK}alpha\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}jacobian\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}。doPattern\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}标志将使\end{CJK}\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象以\end{CJK}\texttt{volume}, \texttt{skeleton}, \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}项的默认模式初始化\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矩阵\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
 // Residual assembly flags
 enum { doAlphaVolume = true };
 enum { doAlphaSkeleton = true };
 enum { doAlphaBoundary = true };

 // Pattern assembly flags
 enum { doPatternVolume = true };
 enum { doPatternSkeleton = true };
 enum { doPatternBoundary = true };

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该类中的下一个是构造函数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它简单地接受问题参数并将其存储在类的数据成员中\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
ReactionDiffusionDG(std::function<double(const FieldVector<double, dim> &)> c,
                    std::function<double(const FieldVector<double, dim> &)> f,
                    std::function<double(const FieldVector<double, dim> &)>
                        neumann,
                    double kappa)
    : kappa_(kappa),
      c_(c),
      f_(f),
      neumann_(neumann)
{
}
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码中包含了\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_volume}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_jacobian}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们跳过这些方法\end{CJK}。

\texttt{ReactionDiffusionDG}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类的第一个新方法是\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它集合了\end{CJK}\ref{11.16}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中给出的\end{CJK}SIPG\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的骨架部分的代数表述\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用于给定的离散函数\end{CJK}$u_{h}$。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}更确切地说\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法实现了两个相邻元素\end{CJK}$T_{\mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$T_{\text {out }}:$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}之间的单一交线\end{CJK}$\gamma$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的贡献\end{CJK}。
\begin{equation}
\begin{array}{r}
\left(\mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\text {SIPG,skel }}\left(u_{h}\right)\right)_{i}:=-\int_{\gamma}\left\{\left\langle\nabla u_{h}, \mathbf{n}\right\rangle\right\} \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket d s-\int_{\gamma}\left\{\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}, \mathbf{n}\right\rangle\right\} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket d s \\
+\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma}} \int_{\gamma} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket d s \quad i=0, \ldots, n-1
\end{array}
\label{11.17}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这些贡献只有在测试函数\end{CJK}$\theta_{i}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的支持率与元素\end{CJK}$T_{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}或\end{CJK}$T_{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}相交时才可能为非零\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们将这些测试函数分别称为\end{CJK} $\theta_{i}^{\text {in }}$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK} $\theta_{i}^{\text {out }}$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}同样地\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们把试验基函数对两个元素\end{CJK}$T_{\mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$T_{\mathrm{out}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的限制写成\end{CJK}$\phi_{i}^{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\phi_{i}^{\text {out }}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而把整个多值\end{CJK}DG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}基函数写成\end{CJK}$\phi_{i}$。

\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法的接口是\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
template <class IntersectionGeometry,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Residual>
void `alpha_skeleton`(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                    const Vector &xIn,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUOut,
                    const Vector &xOut,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                    Residual &residualIn, Residual &residualOut) const
{

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如第\end{CJK}11.2.5\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章所述\end{CJK}，\texttt{intersectionGeometry}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是对当前交线的封装\end{CJK}，\texttt{localFunctionSpaceUIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{localFunctionSpaceUOut}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}分别是内侧的\end{CJK}\texttt{local finite elements}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素\end{CJK}，\texttt{xIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{xOut}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是\end{CJK}$u_{h}$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的各自对应系数向量\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}参数\end{CJK}\texttt{localFunctionSpaceVIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{localFunctionSpaceVOut}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}持有两个元素\end{CJK}$T_{\mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$T_{\mathrm{out}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的测试函数空间的\end{CJK}\texttt{local finite elements} 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}最后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}产生的残差被返回到两个容器\end{CJK} \texttt{residualIn} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK} \texttt{residual0ut} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法的实现是漫长的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因为所有的设置代码都要做两次\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对涉及的两个元素各做一次\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法首先存储各种类型和几何对象供以后使用\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
using TrialFE = typename LocalFunctionSpaceU::Traits::FiniteElementType;
using TestFE = typename LocalFunctionSpaceV::Traits::FiniteElementType;
using LocalBasisU = typename TrialFE::Traits::LocalBasisType;
using LocalBasisV = typename TestFE::Traits::LocalBasisType;
using RangeU = typename LocalBasisU::Traits::RangeType;
using RangeV = typename LocalBasisV::Traits::RangeType;
using GradientU = typename LocalBasisU::Traits::JacobianType;
using GradientV = typename LocalBasisV::Traits::JacobianType;
using size_type = typename LocalFunctionSpaceV::Traits::SizeType;

// References to inside and `outside` elements
const auto &elementInside = intersectionGeometry.inside();
const auto &elementOutside = intersectionGeometry.outside();

// Intersection and element geometries
auto geo = intersectionGeometry.geometry();
auto geoIn = elementInside.geometry();
auto geoOut = elementOutside.geometry();

// Geometries of intersection in local coordinates
// of elementInside and elementOutside
auto geoInInside = intersectionGeometry.geometryInInside();
auto geoInOutside = intersectionGeometry.geometryInOutside();

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码使用第\end{CJK}32\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}行中定义的方法\end{CJK}\texttt{diameter}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}预先计算出交线直径\end{CJK}$h_{\gamma}$。

\begin{verbatim}
auto h = diameter(geo);
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}之后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它创建容器来存储形状函数值和\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素上的梯度\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}独立的容器被用来存储与参考元素坐标和网格元素坐标有关的梯度\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Shape function values
std::vector<RangeU> phiIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn.size());
std::vector<RangeV> thetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());
std::vector<RangeU> phiOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut.size());
std::vector<RangeV> thetaOut(localFunctionSpaceVOut.size());

// Shape function gradients on the reference element
std::vector<GradientU> localGradPhiIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn.size());
std::vector<GradientV> localGradThetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());
std::vector<GradientU> localGradPhiOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut.size());
std::vector<GradientV> localGradThetaOut(localFunctionSpaceVOut.size());

// Shape function gradients on the grid element
std::vector<GradientU> gradPhiIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn.size());
std::vector<GradientV> gradThetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());
std::vector<GradientU> gradPhiOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut.size());
std::vector<GradientV> gradThetaOut(localFunctionSpaceVOut.size());
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}接下来是正交循环\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了简单起见\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码使用\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素上的基础的两倍的多项式阶数作为合适的正交阶数的猜测\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
const auto quadOrder = 2 * localFunctionSpaceUIn.finiteElement().localBasis().order();
constexpr auto intersectionDim = IntersectionGeometry::mydimension;
const auto &quadRule = QuadratureRules<double, intersectionDim>::
    rule(intersectionGeometry.geometry().type(),
         quadOrder);

for (const auto &quadPoint : quadRule)
{
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}正交循环一直延伸到方法的末端\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在循环体的开始\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代码评估了\end{CJK}\texttt{shape functions}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}及其\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian}s。\texttt{geoInInside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{geoInOutside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象被用来将正交点的位置从交线上的坐标转换到相邻元素上的坐标\end{CJK}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第\end{CJK}$5.4$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章\end{CJK}）。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于涉及到两个元素上的基函数\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所以需要对值和梯度进行四次调用\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而试验和测试函数是分开处理的\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Quadrature point position in local coordinates of adjacent elements
auto quadPointLocalIn = geoInInside.global(quadPoint.position());
auto quadPointLocalOut = geoInOutside.global(quadPoint.position());

// Evaluate shape functions
localFunctionSpaceUIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalIn, phiIn);
localFunctionSpaceUOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalOut, phiOut);
localFunctionSpaceVIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalIn, thetaIn);
localFunctionSpaceVOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalOut, thetaOut);

// Evaluate gradients of shape functions
localFunctionSpaceUIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalIn,
                                                                    localGradPhiIn);
localFunctionSpaceUOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalOut,
                                                                     localGradPhiOut);
localFunctionSpaceVIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalIn,
                                                                    localGradThetaIn);
localFunctionSpaceVOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalOut,
                                                                     localGradThetaOut);

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后形状函数梯度被转换为两个网格元素\end{CJK}Tin\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}Tout\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的坐标\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这是以通常的方式发生的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但由于涉及两个不同的元素\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所以也使用了两个不同的转换矩阵\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
auto jacInvTranspIn = geoIn.jacobianInverseTransposed(quadPointLocalIn);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUIn.size(); i++)
    jacInvTranspIn.mv(localGradPhiIn[i][0], gradPhiIn[i][0]);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
    jacInvTranspIn.mv(localGradThetaIn[i][0], gradThetaIn[i][0]);

auto jacInvTranspOut = geoOut.jacobianInverseTransposed(quadPointLocalOut);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUOut.size(); i++)
    jacInvTranspOut.mv(localGradPhiOut[i][0], gradPhiOut[i][0]);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
    jacInvTranspOut.mv(localGradThetaOut[i][0], gradThetaOut[i][0]);
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}下面的模块在当前积分点计算\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\nabla u_{h}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}分别是基函数值及其梯度的线性组合\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Compute values of u_h
RangeU uIn(0.0);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUIn.size(); i++)
    uIn += xIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn, i) * phiIn[i];
RangeU uOut(0.0);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUOut.size(); i++)
    uOut += xOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut, i) * phiOut[i];

// Compute gradients of u_h
GradientU gradUIn(0.0);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUIn.size(); i++)
    gradUIn.axpy(xIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn, i), gradPhiIn[i]);
GradientU gradUOut(0.0);
for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUOut.size(); i++)
    gradUOut.axpy(xOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut, i), gradPhiOut[i]);
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在正交点不连续\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}有两个\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的值要计算\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}还有两个\end{CJK}$\nabla u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的值\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}最后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}三个循环计算\end{CJK}$\mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\text {SIPG,skel }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的三个项的值\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}定义在\end{CJK}\ref{11.17}。

\begin{verbatim}
        // Unit normal from T_in to T_out
        auto n_F = intersectionGeometry.unitOuterNormal(quadPoint.position());

        // Integration factor
        auto factor = quadPoint.weight() * geo.integrationElement(quadPoint.position());

        // Interior penalty term
        auto interiorPenaltyTerm = -0.5 * (gradUIn[0] * n_F + gradUOut[0] * n_F);
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
            residualIn.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                                  i,
                                  interiorPenaltyTerm *thetaIn[i] * factor);
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
            residualOut.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                                   i,
                                   -interiorPenaltyTerm *thetaOut[i] * factor);

        // Symmetric interior penalty term
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
            residualIn.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                                  i,
                                  -0.5 * (gradThetaIn[i][0] * n_F) * (uIn - uOut) * factor);
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
            residualOut.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                                   i,
                                   -0.5 * (gradThetaOut[i][0] * n_F) * (uIn - uOut) * factor);

        // Coercivity term
        auto coercivityTerm = (kappa_ / h) * (uIn - uOut);
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
            residualIn.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                                  i,
                                  coercivityTerm *thetaIn[i] * factor);
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
            residualOut.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                                   i,
                                   -coercivityTerm *thetaOut[i] * factor);
    }
}

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}注意输出\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的贡献现在被分成两部分\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}一部分包含用\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的测试函数\end{CJK}$\theta_{i}^{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}测试的结果\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}另一部分是对\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的测试函数\end{CJK}$\theta_{i}^{\text {out }}$。

\begin{itemize}
  \item \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第一对循环将\end{CJK}$-\left\{\left\langle\nabla u_{h}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle\right\} \theta_{i}^{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}添加到\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}将\end{CJK}$\left\{\left\langle\nabla u_{h}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle\right\} \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}添加到\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这相当于\end{CJK}\ref{11.17}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的术语\end{CJK}$-\left\{\left\langle\nabla u_{h}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle\right\} \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket$。

  \item \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第二对循环将\end{CJK}$-\frac{1}{2}\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}添加到\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}并将\end{CJK}$-\frac{1}{2}\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}添加到\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这与术语\end{CJK}$-\left\{\left\langle\nabla \theta, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle\right\} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}相对应\end{CJK}。

  \item \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}第三对循环将\end{CJK}$\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma}} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket \theta_{i}^{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}添加到\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}并将\end{CJK}$-\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma}} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}添加到\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素中\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这对应于术语\end{CJK}$\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma}} \llbracket u_{h} \rrbracket \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket$ 。

\end{itemize}
\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法到此结束\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}下一个方法是\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_skeleton} ，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它计算\end{CJK}\texttt{residual} $\mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \operatorname{skel}}\left(u_{h}\right)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的系数\end{CJK}$\bar{u}^{\mathrm{in}} \in \mathbb{R}^{n_{T} \mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\bar{u}^{\text {out }} \in \mathbb{R}^{n} T_{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}分别在\end{CJK}$T_{\text {in }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$T_{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的交线的导数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中是线性的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}导数是一个独立于\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的矩阵\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}导数是\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\frac{\left.\partial \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \mathrm{skel}}(\bar{u})\right)_{i}}{\partial \bar{u}_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}}=-\frac{1}{2} \int_{\gamma}\left\langle\nabla \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket d s-\int_{\gamma}\left\{\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle\right\} \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}} d s+\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma}} \int_{\gamma} \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}} \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket d s 
\label{11.18a}
\end{equation}
\begin{equation}
\frac{\left.\partial \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \mathrm{skel}}(\bar{u})\right)_{i}}{\partial \bar{u}_{j}^{\text {out }}}=-\frac{1}{2} \int_{\gamma}\left\langle\nabla \phi_{j}^{\text {out }}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket d s \\
+\int_{\gamma}\left\{\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma}\right\rangle\right\} \phi_{j}^{\text {out }} d s-\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma}} \int_{\gamma} \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{out}} \llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket d s
\label{11.18b}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}\ref{11.18a}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}表示相对于\end{CJK}\texttt{inside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的自由度的导数\end{CJK}，\ref{11.18b}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}表示\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素的相应导数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矩阵行可以根据相应的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矢量条目是否与内部或\end{CJK}\texttt{outside}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}元素相关联进行分类\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于\end{CJK}\ref{11.18a}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}利用该\end{CJK}
$$
\llbracket \theta_{i} \rrbracket=\theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}-\theta_{i}^{\text {out }} \quad \text { and } \quad\left\{\nabla \theta_{i}\right\}=\frac{1}{2}\left(\nabla \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}+\nabla \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}\right)
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们得到\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\frac{\left.\partial \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \operatorname{skel}}\left(\bar{u}^{\mathrm{in}}\right)\right)_{i}}{\partial \bar{u}_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}}=-\frac{1}{2}\left[\left\langle\nabla \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}+\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}\right]+\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}} \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}} \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}
\label{11.19a}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\frac{\left.\partial \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \mathrm{skel}}\left(\bar{u}^{\mathrm{out}}\right)\right)_{i}}{\partial \bar{u}_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}}=\frac{1}{2}\left[\left\langle\nabla \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}-\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}}\right]-\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}} \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{in}} \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}
\label{11.19b}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}同样\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于\end{CJK}\ref{11.18b}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们可以得到\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\frac{\left.\partial \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \text { skel }}\left(\bar{u}^{\mathrm{in}}\right)\right)_{i}}{\partial \bar{u}_{j}^{\text {out }}}=\frac{1}{2}\left[-\left\langle\nabla \phi_{j}^{\text {out }}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}+\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{i}}\right\rangle \phi_{j}^{\text {out }}\right]-\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma^{i}}} \phi_{j}^{\text {out }} \theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}
\label{11.19c}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\frac{\left.\partial \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \mathrm{skel}}\left(\bar{u}^{\mathrm{out}}\right)\right)_{i}}{\partial \bar{u}_{j}^{\text {out }}}=\frac{1}{2}\left[\left\langle\nabla \phi_{j}^{\text {out }}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}+\left\langle\nabla \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}, \mathbf{n}_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}\right\rangle \phi_{j}^{\mathrm{out}}\right]+\frac{\kappa}{h_{\gamma^{\mathrm{i}}}} \phi_{j}^{\text {out }} \theta_{i}^{\text {out }}
\label{11.19d}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这种自然的\end{CJK}$2 \times 2$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}矩阵块结构在方法接口上是可见的\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
template <class IntersectionGeometry,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Jacobian>
void jacobian_skeleton(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                       const Vector &xIn,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUOut,
                       const Vector &xOut,
                       const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                       Jacobian &jacobianInIn, Jacobian &jacobianInOut,
                       Jacobian &jacobianOutIn, Jacobian &jacobianOutOut)
    const

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中四个输出矩阵\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobianInIn}、\texttt{jacobianInOut}、\texttt{jacobianOutIn}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobianOut0ut}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对应于\end{CJK}$\nabla \mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \mathrm{skel}}$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的四个子矩阵\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所有的方法参数已经在第\end{CJK}11.2.5\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章中进行了描述\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该方法的实现与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法类似\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}通过预先计算各种几何对象\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}并为形状函数值和梯度分配容器\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Define types
using TrialFE = typename LocalFunctionSpaceU::Traits::FiniteElementType;
using TestFE = typename LocalFunctionSpaceV::Traits::FiniteElementType;
using LocalBasisU = typename TrialFE::Traits::LocalBasisType;
using LocalBasisV = typename TestFE::Traits::LocalBasisType;
using RangeU = typename LocalBasisU::Traits::RangeType;
using RangeV = typename LocalBasisV::Traits::RangeType;
using GradientU = typename LocalBasisU::Traits::JacobianType;
using GradientV = typename LocalBasisV::Traits::JacobianType;
using size_type = typename LocalFunctionSpaceV::Traits::SizeType;

// References to inside and outside elements
const auto &elementInside = intersectionGeometry.inside();
const auto &elementOutside = intersectionGeometry.outside();

// Get geometries
auto geo = intersectionGeometry.geometry();
auto geoIn = elementInside.geometry();
auto geoOut = elementOutside.geometry();

// Geometries of intersection in local coordinates
// of elementInside and elementOutside
auto geoInInside = intersectionGeometry.geometryInInside();
auto geoInOutside = intersectionGeometry.geometryInOutside();

// Intersection diameter
auto h = diameter(geo);

// Shape function values
std::vector<RangeU> phiIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn.size());
std::vector<RangeU> phiOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut.size());
std::vector<RangeV> thetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());
std::vector<RangeV> thetaOut(localFunctionSpaceVOut.size());

// Shape function gradients on the reference element
std::vector<GradientU> localGradPhiIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn.size());
std::vector<GradientU> localGradPhiOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut.size());
std::vector<GradientV> localGradThetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());
std::vector<GradientV> localGradThetaOut(localFunctionSpaceVOut.size());

// Shape function gradients on the grid element
std::vector<GradientU> gradPhiIn(localFunctionSpaceUIn.size());
std::vector<GradientU> gradPhiOut(localFunctionSpaceUOut.size());
std::vector<GradientV> gradThetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());
std::vector<GradientV> gradThetaOut(localFunctionSpaceVOut.size());

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}紧接着开始正交循环\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}首先计算试验基函数\end{CJK}$\left\{\phi_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}\right\}_{i}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\left\{\phi_{i}^{\text {out }}\right\}_{i}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以及测试基函数\end{CJK}$\left\{\theta_{i}^{\mathrm{in}}\right\}_{i}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\left\{\theta_{i}^{\text {out }}\right\}_{i}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在当前正交点的数值和梯度\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
auto quadOrder = 2 * localFunctionSpaceUIn.finiteElement().localBasis().order();
constexpr auto intersectionDim = IntersectionGeometry::mydimension;
const auto &quadRule = QuadratureRules<double, intersectionDim>::
    rule(intersectionGeometry.geometry().type(),
         quadOrder);

for (const auto &quadPoint : quadRule)
{
    // Position of quadrature point in local coordinates
    // of inside and outside elements
    auto quadPointLocalIn = geoInInside.global(quadPoint.position());
    auto quadPointLocalOut = geoInOutside.global(quadPoint.position());

    // Evaluate shape functions
    localFunctionSpaceUIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalIn, phiIn);
    localFunctionSpaceUOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalOut, phiOut);

    localFunctionSpaceVIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalIn, thetaIn);
    localFunctionSpaceVOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalOut, thetaOut);

    // Evaluate gradients of shape functions
    localFunctionSpaceUIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalIn,
                                                                        localGradPhiIn);
    localFunctionSpaceUOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalOut,
                                                                         localGradPhiOut);

    localFunctionSpaceVIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalIn,
                                                                        localGradThetaIn);
    localFunctionSpaceVOut.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(quadPointLocalOut,
                                                                         localGradThetaOut);

    // Transform gradients of shape functions to element coordinates
    auto jacInvTranspIn = geoIn.jacobianInverseTransposed(quadPointLocalIn);
    for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUIn.size(); i++)
        jacInvTranspIn.mv(localGradPhiIn[i][0], gradPhiIn[i][0]);
    for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
        jacInvTranspIn.mv(localGradThetaIn[i][0], gradThetaIn[i][0]);

    auto jacInvTranspOut = geoOut.jacobianInverseTransposed(quadPointLocalOut);
    for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceUOut.size(); i++)
        jacInvTranspOut.mv(localGradPhiOut[i][0], gradPhiOut[i][0]);
    for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
        jacInvTranspOut.mv(localGradThetaOut[i][0], gradThetaOut[i][0]);
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这都与\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法非常相似\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}四个循环用\end{CJK}$\mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \text { skel }}\left(\bar{u}^{\mathrm{in}}\right)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\mathcal{R}_{\gamma}^{\mathrm{SIPG}, \mathrm{skel}}\left(\bar{u}^{\text {out }}\right)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}相对于\end{CJK}$\bar{u}^{\mathrm{in}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\bar{u}^{\text {out }}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的条目的导数填充结果的四个子矩阵\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如表达式\end{CJK}\ref{11.19a}-\ref{11.19d}。

\begin{verbatim}
        // Unit normal from T_in to T_out
        auto n_F = intersectionGeometry.unitOuterNormal(quadPoint.position());

        // Integration factor
        auto factor = quadPoint.weight() * geo.integrationElement(quadPoint.position());

        // Fill jacobianInIn
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
        {
            for (size_type j = 0; j < localFunctionSpaceUIn.size(); j++)
            {
                jacobianInIn.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                                        i,
                                        localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                                        j,
                                        (-0.5 * (gradPhiIn[j][0] * n_F) * thetaIn[i] - 0.5 * phiIn[j] *         (gradThetaIn[i][0] * n_F) + (kappa_ / h) * phiIn[j] * thetaIn[i]) *         factor);
            }
        }

        // Fill jacobianInOut
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
        {
            for (size_type j = 0; j < localFunctionSpaceUIn.size(); j++)
            {
                jacobianInOut.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                                         i,
                                         localFunctionSpaceUOut,
                                         j,
                                         (-0.5 * (n_F * gradPhiOut[j][0]) * thetaIn[i] + 0.5 * phiOut[j] *      (n_F * gradThetaIn[i][0]) - (kappa_ / h) * phiOut[j] * thetaIn[i])      * factor);
            }
        }

        // Fill jacobianOutIn
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
        {
            for (size_type j = 0; j < localFunctionSpaceUOut.size(); j++)
            {
                jacobianOutIn.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                                         i,
                                         localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                                         j,
                                         (0.5 * (n_F * gradPhiIn[j][0]) * thetaOut[i] - 0.5 * phiIn[j] *        (n_F * gradThetaOut[i][0]) - (kappa_ / h) * phiIn[j] * thetaOut[i]  ) * factor);
            }
        }

        // Fill jacobianOutOut
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVOut.size(); i++)
        {
            for (size_type j = 0; j < localFunctionSpaceUOut.size(); j++)
            {
                jacobianOutOut.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVOut,
                                          i,
                                          localFunctionSpaceUOut,
                                          j,
                                          (0.5 * (n_F * gradPhiOut[j][0]) * thetaOut[i] + 0.5 * phiOut[j] *         (n_F * gradThetaOut[i][0]) + (kappa_ / h) * phiOut[j] * thetaOut        [i]) * factor);
            }
        }
    }
}

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}至此\end{CJK}，\texttt{jacobian\_skeleton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法结束\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}反应\end{CJK}-\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}扩散问题的\end{CJK}\texttt{LocalOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现的最后一个方法是\end{CJK}\texttt{alpha\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{jacobian\_boundary}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它们分别计算\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界项\end{CJK}$-\int_{\partial \Omega} \mathrm{j} \theta d s$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和其\end{CJK}\texttt{Jacobian}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它们比骨架项的方法简单得多\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因为它们只涉及一个元素\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}此外\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}项不依赖于\end{CJK}$u_{h}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所以根本不使用试验函数空间\end{CJK}\texttt{localFunctionSpaceUIn}。

\begin{verbatim}
// Boundary integral implementing the Neumann term
template <class IntersectionGeometry,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
          class LocalFunctionSpaceV, class Residual>
void alpha_boundary(const IntersectionGeometry &intersectionGeometry,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceU &localFunctionSpaceUIn,
                    const Vector &xIn,
                    const LocalFunctionSpaceV &localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                    Residual &residualIn) const
{
    using TestFE = typename LocalFunctionSpaceV::Traits::FiniteElementType;
    using RangeV = typename TestFE::Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeType;
    using size_type = typename LocalFunctionSpaceV::Traits::SizeType;

    // Get geometry of intersection in local coordinates of element_inside
    auto geoInInside = intersectionGeometry.geometryInInside();

    std::vector<RangeV> thetaIn(localFunctionSpaceVIn.size());

    // Loop over quadrature points
    const int quadOrder = 2 * localFunctionSpaceVIn.finiteElement().localBasis().order();
    constexpr auto intersectionDim = IntersectionGeometry::mydimension;
    const auto &quadRule = QuadratureRules<double, intersectionDim>::
        rule(intersectionGeometry.geometry().type(),
             quadOrder);

    for (const auto &quadPoint : quadRule)
    {
        // Position of quadrature point in local coordinates of elements
        auto quadPointLocalIn = geoInInside.global(quadPoint.position());

        // Evaluate basis functions
        localFunctionSpaceVIn.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateFunction(quadPointLocalIn, thetaIn);

        // Integration factor
        auto factor = quadPoint.weight() * intersectionGeometry.geometry()
                                               .integrationElement(quadPoint.position());

        // Evaluate Neumann boundary condition
        auto neumannValue = neumann_(intersectionGeometry.geometry()
                                         .global(quadPoint.position()));

        // Integrate
        for (size_type i = 0; i < localFunctionSpaceVIn.size(); i++)
            residualIn.accumulate(localFunctionSpaceVIn,
                                  i,
                                  -1 * neumannValue * thetaIn[i] * factor);
    }
}

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}更重要的是\end{CJK}，\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}项相对于\end{CJK}$u_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的导数消失了\end{CJK}，\texttt{jacobian\_boundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法可以简单地成为空\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
 template<class IntersectionGeometry,
    class LocalFunctionSpaceU, class Vector,
    class LocalFunctionSpaceV, typename Jacobian>
 void jacobian_boundary(const IntersectionGeometry& intersectionGeometry,
        const LocalFunctionSpaceU& localFunctionSpaceUIn,
        const Vector& xIn,
        const LocalFunctionSpaceV& localFunctionSpaceVIn,
        Jacobian& jacobianInIn) const
 {
    // Does not do anything---the Jacobian of the boundary term is zero.
 }

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然而\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}请注意\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}不能简单地撇开该方法\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于\end{CJK}\texttt{doAlphaBoundary}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}标志被设置\end{CJK}，\texttt{GridOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}假定该方法是存在的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}从代码中完全省略它\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}会导致编译时错误\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它还将一个名为\end{CJK} \texttt{pdelab-dg-diffusion-result.vtu} \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的文件写入磁盘\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中包含子采样结果函数\end{CJK} $u_{h}$ 。\href{https://cdn.mathpix.com/snip/images/6Npxi99ELV4qgtwS1hUD0MNR3Gnx12kHfOgfLMd7EE0.original.fullsize.png}{Fig11.5}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}左侧显示了作为高度场的结果的可视化\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}可以清楚地看到有限元解决方案的不连续性\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}同一个图的右边显示了使用更细的网格运行程序时的结果\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}正如\end{CJK}DG\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}理论所预测的那样\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}不连续性随着网格分辨率的增加而减少\end{CJK}。

\subsection{Dirichlet Boundary Conditions}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在本章之前的所有例题中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们有意省略了\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}即形式为的约束条件\end{CJK}
$$
u=\mathrm{g} \quad \text { on } \Gamma_{D}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于域边界\end{CJK}$\partial \Omega$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的子集\end{CJK}$\Gamma_{D}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的给定函数\end{CJK}$\mathrm{g}$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}现在我们补上这一点\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-pdelab}、\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件被作为一个更普遍的机制的特例来实现\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该机制允许对有限元函数的系数应用任意的线性约束\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这有一些有趣的应用\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}比如在不符合要求的网格上构造符合要求的有限元空间\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}符合要求的\end{CJK}$p$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}自适应方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以及周期性边界条件\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然而\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了限制本书的总体篇幅\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}将只讨论\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对更一般的约束条件感兴趣的读者应该查阅在线文档\end{CJK}。

\subsubsection{Dirichlet Boundary Conditions and the Residual Form}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}非零的\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件不适合第\end{CJK}11.2.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章的框架\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因此我们略作概括\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}让\end{CJK}$\Omega$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是\end{CJK}$\mathbb{R}^{d}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的一个开放的有界子集\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而\end{CJK}$f: \Omega \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是一个具有足够平滑性的给定函数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与第\end{CJK}11.2.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章一样\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们寻找一个函数\end{CJK}$u: \Omega \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}来解决方程\end{CJK}
$$
-\operatorname{div} \mathcal{A}(x, u, \nabla u)+h(u)=f \quad \text { in } \Omega \subset \mathbb{R}^{d}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}$\mathcal{A}: \Omega \times \mathbb{R} \times \mathbb{R}^{d} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}^{d}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是一阶椭圆微分算子的代数表示\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而\end{CJK}$h: \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是描述反应项的函数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与第\end{CJK}$11.2.1$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章相比\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们将领域边界划分为两部分\end{CJK}$\Gamma_{D}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$\Gamma_{N}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们用混合条件代替纯\end{CJK}\texttt{Neumann}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件\end{CJK}\ref{11.2b}。
\begin{equation}
u =\mathrm{g} \quad \quad \text { on } \Gamma_{D} 
\label{11.20a}
\end{equation}
\begin{equation}
\langle\mathcal{A}(x, u, \nabla u), \mathbf{n}\rangle &=\mathrm{j} & & \text { on } \Gamma_{N}
\label{11.20b}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}$g: \Gamma_{D} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是一个给定的\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}具有足够平滑性的边界值函数\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了说明这个问题的弱形式\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们引入新的\end{CJK}\texttt{Sobolev}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}空间\end{CJK}
$$
H_{D, \mathrm{~g}}^{1}:=\left\{v \in H^{1}(\Omega): v=\mathrm{g} \text { on } \Gamma_{D}\right\}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}
$$
H_{D, 0}^{1}:=\left\{v \in H^{1}(\Omega): v=0 \text { on } \Gamma_{D}\right\}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件应在痕迹\end{CJK}\footnotemark[9] \footnotemark[12]\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的意义上理解\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}使用标准程序\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们发现模型问题的弱形式为\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
\text { Find } u \in H_{D, \mathrm{~g}}^{1}: \int_{\Omega}\langle\mathcal{A}(x, u, \nabla u), \nabla v\rangle d x &+\int_{\Omega} h(u) v d x \\
&=\int_{\Omega} f v d x+\int_{\Gamma_{N}} \mathrm{j} v d s \quad \forall v \in H_{D, 0}^{1}
\end{aligned}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个方程的\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}形式是\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\text { Find } u \in H_{D, \mathrm{~g}}^{1}: \quad r(u, v)=0 \quad \forall v \in H_{D, 0}^{1}
\label{11.21}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与\end{CJK}
$$
r(u, v):=\int_{\Omega}\langle\mathcal{A}(x, u, \nabla u), \nabla v\rangle d x+\int_{\Omega} h(u) v d x-\int_{\Omega} f v d x-\int_{\Gamma_{N}} \mathrm{j} v d s
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个问题不属于\end{CJK}\ref{11.5}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类型\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因为解\end{CJK}$u$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}不是从线性空间中提取的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然而\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}空间\end{CJK}$H_{D, g}^{1}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是\end{CJK}\texttt{affine}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因此对于任何\end{CJK}$w_{\mathrm{g}} \in H_{D, \mathrm{~g}}^{1}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}都可以写成\end{CJK}$H_{D, \mathrm{~g}}^{1}=w_{\mathrm{g}}+H_{D, 0}^{1}$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}利用这一点\end{CJK}，\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的表述\end{CJK}\ref{11.21}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}可以只用线性空间重新表述\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们得到\end{CJK}
$$
\text { Find } \tilde{u} \in H_{D, 0}^{1}: \quad r\left(w_{\mathrm{g}}+\tilde{u}, v\right)=0 \quad \forall v \in H_{D, 0}^{1}
$$
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了离散化问题\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们选择两个有限元空间\end{CJK}$U_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$V_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}分别作为试验和测试函数\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}函数\end{CJK}$w_{\mathrm{g}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由一个离散函数\end{CJK}$w_{h, \mathrm{~g}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}来近似\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}通常\end{CJK}，$w_{h, \mathrm{~g}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界上近似于\end{CJK}$\mathrm{g}$，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}而在远离该边界的地方为零\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为了允许不符合要求的有限元\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}即有限元空间\end{CJK}$U_{h}, V_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}不是\end{CJK}$H_{D, 0}^{1}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的子空间\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们正式用离散近似\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}代替\end{CJK}$r_{h}$ 。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如前所述\end{CJK}，\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}形式\end{CJK}$r_{h}: U_{h} \times V_{h} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在其第一个参数中可能是非线性的\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但在其第二个参数中总是线性的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}总之\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们得到了仿射\end{CJK}\texttt{residual}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}形式\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它概括了假设\end{CJK}11.1\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}给出的线性形式\end{CJK}。

\textbf{Assumption} 11.3 \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}所有相关的边界值问题都可以写成以下形式\end{CJK}
\begin{equation}
\text { Find } u_{h} \in w_{h, \mathrm{~g}}+U_{h}: \quad r_{h}\left(u_{h}, v_{h}\right)=0 \quad \forall v_{h} \in V_{h}
\label{11.22}
\end{equation}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于合适的向量空间\end{CJK} $U_{h}, V_{h}$ 、\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}函数\end{CJK} $w_{h, \mathrm{~g}}$ \begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和形式\end{CJK} $r_{h}(\cdot, \cdot)$ 。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}我们再次假设\end{CJK}$U_{h}, V_{h}, w_{h, \mathrm{~g}}$ ，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}$r_{h}(\cdot, \cdot)$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是这样的\end{CJK}：\ref{11.22}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}至少有一个解\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}像\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这样具有同质\end{CJK}$H_{D, 0}^{1}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件的空间离散化被称为约束空间\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}因为它们被看作是\end{CJK}$H^{1}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这样的\end{CJK} "\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}完整\end{CJK} "\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}空间与\end{CJK}$v=0$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}上的同质线性代数约束的结合\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}迭代方法\end{CJK}（\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如\end{CJK}\texttt{Newton}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它是解决非线性系统\end{CJK}\ref{11.22}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的标准方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}当从初始迭代\end{CJK}$w_{h, \mathrm{~g}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}开始时\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如果在具有同质\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件的空间中计算校正\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}将产生具有正确边界条件的迭代结果\end{CJK}。

\texttt{affine``dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}公式的实现分两步进行\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它首先需要一个代表应用于有限元空间的约束类型的类\end{CJK}。\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}模块提供了几种选择\end{CJK}；\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}以前的例子使用了\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
PDELab::NoConstraints
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中规定了没有约束\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件的适当类型是\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
PDELab::ConformingDirichletConstraints
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这两种类型都是作为标签类使用的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}不期望用户构造这种类型的对象\end{CJK}；\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}相反\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该类型被用来对\end{CJK}\texttt{GridFunctionSpace}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类进行参数化\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}例如\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}具有\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}约束的一阶\end{CJK}\texttt{Lagrange}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}空间的\end{CJK}\texttt{GridFunctionSpace}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象的设置代码是\end{CJK}。

\begin{verbatim}
using Basis = Functions::LagrangeBasis<GridView, 1>;
auto basis = std::make_shared<Basis>(gridView);

using VectorBackend = PDELab::ISTL::VectorBackend<>;
using Constraints = PDELab::ConformingDirichletConstraints;

using GridFunctionSpace = PDELab::Experimental::GridFunctionSpace<Basis,
                                                                  VectorBackend,
                                                                  Constraints>;

GridFunctionSpace gridFunctionSpace(basis);
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其次\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}实现需要有一个所谓的\end{CJK}\texttt{ConstraintsContainer object}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用来存储实际的约束\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}由于\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}中的约束是线性的\end{CJK}，\texttt{ConstraintsContainer}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}可以被概念化为一个稀疏的矩阵\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这个矩阵的内核正是由那些满足约束条件的系数向量组成\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}与上面的\end{CJK}\texttt{Constraints}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}标签类不同\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用户程序应该自己创建一个\end{CJK}\texttt{ConstraintsContainer}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}准确的类型由\end{CJK}\texttt{GridFunctionSpace}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类导出为\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}
template<class T>
class GridFunctionSpace::ConstraintsContainer<T>::Type
\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}其中\end{CJK}$\mathrm{T}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}是用于存储约束矩阵条目的数字类型\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}在下一节示例代码的第\end{CJK}86\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}行中给出了如何访问该类型的例子\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}限制条件的组装是由自由方法触发的\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}

void PDELab::constraints(const Predicate &predicate,

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}类型\end{CJK}\texttt{Predicate}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}必须是一个谓词类\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它决定了受限自由度的集合\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对于类型\end{CJK}\texttt{ConformingDirichletConstraints}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的约束\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}它必须实现一个方法\end{CJK}

\begin{verbatim}

bool isDirichlet(const IntersectionGeometry &intersection,

\end{verbatim}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}如果边界交线上坐标为\end{CJK}xi\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的点是\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界\end{CJK}$\Gamma_{D}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的一部分\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}返回\end{CJK}true。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}然后在构建\end{CJK}\texttt{ConstraintsContainer}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}时\end{CJK}，\texttt{Grid0perator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的类型和对象必须被移交出去\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}为此\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}该类有一个扩展的模板标签\end{CJK}

\texttt{GridOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}用这个构造函数设置的对象将在受限空间中组装代数有限元问题\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}设置具有\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}约束的代数有限元问题的最后一步是设置或修改初始迭代\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}使其满足\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}边界条件\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}这通常是通过将\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}值函数\end{CJK}$w_{\mathrm{g}}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}投影到空间\end{CJK}$U_{h}$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}来实现的\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}虽然\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}提供了这样的方法\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}但本书的所有例子都直接使用\end{CJK}\texttt{dune-functions}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}的相应功能\end{CJK}（10.6.3\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章\end{CJK}）。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}具体做法见第\end{CJK}$11.3 .2$\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}章中的例子\end{CJK}。

\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}除了具有约束意识的\end{CJK}\texttt{GridFunctionSpace}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}和\end{CJK}\texttt{GridOperator}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}对象\end{CJK}，\texttt{dune-pdelab}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}模块为处理\end{CJK}\texttt{Dirichlet}\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}约束提供了一系列进一步的有用功能\end{CJK}。\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}例如\end{CJK}，\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{mj}方法\end{CJK}
